Our services business continues to grow, providing recurring revenue and deepening our relationship with our customers. It's more than just selling machines.
Our See & Spray technology uses computer vision and machine learning to target and spray individual weeds, reducing herbicide use by over 70%. Good for the farmer and the environment.
We are bringing back the plug-in hybrid. It's a key transition technology that will help more customers experience the benefits of electric driving.
The R2 is here. Our new mid-size SUV, designed to bring the Rivian experience to a broader audience. Adventure for all. #R2
The Lucid Air Sapphire is the world's first luxury electric super-sedan. 0-60 in under 2 seconds. The pinnacle of EV performance.
Our battery swapping technology provides a faster and more convenient way to power your EV. A full charge in under 5 minutes.
We believe mRNA is the 'software of life.' Our platform has the potential to create a new class of medicines for a wide range of diseases, from cancer to rare genetic conditions.
Our acquisition of Seagen significantly expands our oncology pipeline, positioning us to be a leader in the fight against cancer. #cancerresearch
Keytruda continues to be a foundational therapy in oncology, approved for dozens of indications. We are committed to exploring its potential in new tumor types and combinations.
The demand for our new weight-loss medicines is unprecedented. We are investing billions to expand our manufacturing capacity to meet this critical patient need.
We are a leader in virology, from HIV to COVID-19. Our scientists are working tirelessly to develop the next generation of antiviral treatments.
Our acquisition of Horizon Therapeutics strengthens our leadership in rare diseases, bringing new medicines to patients with few treatment options.
Our VelociSuite technologies are revolutionizing drug discovery and development, allowing us to move from idea to clinic with unprecedented speed and precision.
Our acquisition of Oak Street Health is a key part of our strategy to build a leading primary care platform, improving patient outcomes and lowering costs.
We are more than a pharmacy. Our new VillageMD primary care clinics are providing convenient and accessible healthcare in the communities we serve.
The shift from cash to digital payments continues to accelerate globally. We are proud to be the network that powers commerce for billions of people.
Security is at the heart of our network. Our AI-powered tools help prevent fraud and protect our customers' data on every transaction.
We are seeing strong spending from our premium card members, particularly in the travel and entertainment categories. A sign of the resilient high-end consumer.
Our iShares ETFs provide investors with transparent, low-cost, and flexible access to a wide range of markets and asset classes. Investing made simple.
As a leading custodian bank, we are proud to safeguard trillions of dollars in assets for the world's largest investors. Trust is our foundation.
Our wealth management business is a key driver of our growth, providing stable, recurring revenues and a strong competitive advantage.
We are proud to serve millions of individual investors. Our mission is to empower them to take control of their financial futures through education, service, and value.
We are exploring the potential of blockchain and digital assets to reshape financial services. Our Fidelity Digital Assets arm is at the forefront of this innovation.
We are seeing attractive opportunities in private credit, as traditional lenders pull back. Our scale and expertise allow us to be a solutions provider in this market.
Our new global infrastructure fund has completed its first close. We see immense opportunities to invest in the essential assets that power our world, from data centers to renewables.
We believe our deep industry expertise and global platform position us to create value across market cycles. A disciplined approach to investing is key.
We are proud to have completed the IPO of Corebridge Financial, creating a simpler, more focused AIG. A major milestone in our transformation.
We are a leader in commercial property and casualty insurance. Our underwriting discipline and claims service are our key differentiators.
Flo is here to help you save. Our Snapshot program rewards safe driving with personalized discounts. It's insurance that's tailored to you.
You're in good hands. Our new mobile app makes it easier than ever to file a claim, pay your bill, and access your insurance information.
Our new report on distracted driving highlights the growing risks on our roads. Put the phone down and stay safe. #distracteddriving
The Travis Scott meal was just the beginning. Get ready for our next collaboration.
We heard you. Queso Blanco is back and better than ever.
From KFC to Taco Bell to Pizza Hut, our iconic brands are feeding the world. We are proud of our global growth story.
Our new Pinpoint Delivery technology allows you to drop a pin on the map and get your pizza delivered to almost anywhere, from the park to the beach.
Our new lineup of zero-sugar sodas is here, offering the great taste you love without the sugar. #zerosugar
Unleash the beast. Our new flavor just dropped. Grab one and power through your day.
From Cheerios to Blue Buffalo pet food, our brands are part of your family's life. We are committed to making food the world loves.
Our turnaround is working. We are investing in our iconic brands, innovating our product portfolio, and driving efficiency in our operations.
We are proud to be a leading producer of protein, from chicken to beef to pork. Feeding families is our passion.
We are at the heart of the global food system, connecting crops to markets and providing essential ingredients for food, feed, and fuel.
Our merger with Viterra creates a premier global agribusiness solutions company, well-positioned to meet the growing demands of a changing world.
We are raising our membership fee for the first time in five years. This will allow us to continue providing the best quality and value to our members.
Our new loyalty program, Target Circle 360, offers unlimited free same-day delivery. Making your Target run even easier.
Our Geek Squad agents are here to help you with all your tech needs, from setup and installation to repairs and support. We've got your back.
The treasure hunt is on. From T.J. Maxx to Marshalls, we offer amazing brands at incredible prices. You never know what you'll find.
We are proud to serve our communities, providing affordable essentials and convenience close to home.
Dress for less. Our off-price model allows us to deliver great bargains to our customers every day.
Get in the zone. Our knowledgeable staff is here to help you find the right parts to keep your car running smoothly.
From the professional mechanic to the DIY enthusiast, we have the parts and expertise to get the job done right.
Ask Sherwin-Williams. Our paint experts are here to help you choose the perfect color for your next project. Cover the Earth.
We protect and beautify the world. From automotive coatings to architectural paints, our products are all around you.
We are combining our materials science expertise with digital tools to accelerate innovation and create new solutions for our customers.
Essential innovations to thrive. Our technologies are at the heart of key markets like electronics, water, and automotive.
We are the global leader in water, hygiene, and infection prevention solutions. We help our customers keep their operations clean, safe, and sustainable.
We are spinning off our healthcare business into a new independent company. This will create two nimbler, more focused companies, better positioned for success.
Our portfolio is aligned with three compelling megatrends: automation, the future of aviation, and the energy transition. We are the future of what's possible.
GE Aerospace is now a standalone company, focused on defining the future of flight. We are proud of our legacy and excited for our future.
From Collins Aerospace to Pratt & Whitney, our businesses are leaders in aerospace and defense. We are connecting and protecting the world.
We are proud to deliver the next batch of F-35 fighter jets to the US Air Force. This 5th generation aircraft provides unparalleled capabilities for our warfighters.
The B-21 Raider is the future of strategic deterrence. This new stealth bomber will be a critical part of the US nuclear triad for decades to come.
From Gulfstream jets to Abrams tanks to Virginia-class submarines, our portfolio of market-leading products serves a wide range of customers in aerospace and defense.
We are a leader in sustainability, investing in recycling infrastructure and renewable natural gas facilities. We are more than just a waste company.
Our new automated sorting facility is using AI and robotics to improve recycling rates and create a more circular economy.
E-commerce continues to drive strong demand for our logistics real estate. We are proud to provide the critical infrastructure that powers modern supply chains.
We are the leading owner of cell towers in the world. Our infrastructure is essential for the rollout of 5G and the future of mobile connectivity.
Our portfolio of towers, small cells, and fiber provides the comprehensive infrastructure our customers need to build and operate their wireless networks.
We are the world's digital infrastructure company. Our data centers provide the foundation for the cloud, connecting businesses to their customers and partners.
The demand for data center capacity is exploding, driven by AI. We are expanding our global platform to meet this unprecedented need.
We are the world's largest producer of wind and solar energy. We are proud to be leading the transition to a sustainable energy future.
Vogtle Unit 4 is now in commercial operation. These new nuclear units will provide clean, reliable, and carbon-free energy to Georgia for the next 60-80 years.
We are modernizing our electric grid to make it smarter, stronger, and more resilient. This will help prevent outages and restore power faster when they do occur.
We are the largest producer of carbon-free energy in the US, thanks to our fleet of nuclear, hydro, and renewable power plants. #cleanenergy
We are focused on delivering clean, safe, and reliable energy to our customers in California and Texas, while also investing in LNG infrastructure to support the global energy transition.
We are committed to a clean energy future. Our recent separation from Constellation allows us to focus on being a premier transmission and distribution utility.
We are proud to be a leader in integrated resorts, providing world-class gaming, entertainment, and hospitality in Las Vegas and Asia.
The Formula 1 Las Vegas Grand Prix was a tremendous success for our city and our company. We are excited for the future of sports and entertainment in Las Vegas.
Luxury is in the details. From our five-star service to our Michelin-starred restaurants, we are committed to providing an unparalleled guest experience.
Our Caesars Rewards program is the best in the business, offering our members exclusive access and benefits at our resorts across the country.
Our new ship, the Carnival Jubilee, has arrived! Get ready for fun at sea with new dining, entertainment, and a roller coaster on the top deck.
Introducing the Icon of the Seas, the largest cruise ship in the world. A new era of vacations is here.
Freestyle Cruising means you're free to vacation your way. No set dining times, no formal dress codes. Just freedom and flexibility.
Our Bonvoy loyalty program is your ticket to the world, with over 30 brands and thousands of hotels to choose from. Where will you go next? #MarriottBonvoy
For the stay. We are proud to provide a warm welcome and reliable service to our guests at our hotels around the world.
We are focused on the high-end traveler. Our acquisition of Apple Leisure Group has significantly expanded our portfolio of all-inclusive luxury resorts.
Summer concert season is here! Check out our website for tickets to see your favorite artists live.
We are committed to getting tickets into the hands of fans. We continue to invest in technology to combat bots and scalpers.
The new EA Sports College Football game is coming this summer. For the first time in a decade, you can play with your favorite schools and players. It's in the game.
Grand Theft Auto VI is coming. Watch the first trailer now.
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III is here. The ultimate threat awaits. Time to squad up.
A new Legend of Zelda game is in development. We hope you'll look forward to it.
The new slim model of the PlayStation 5 is now available. A smaller console with the same next-gen power.
We are proud to announce that Diablo IV is coming to Game Pass. All subscribers can play on day one. #GamePass
Our vision is to build a platform for human co-experience, where people can come together to play, learn, and create. The metaverse is here.
We are listening to our developer community. We have revised our new pricing policy based on your feedback. We are committed to your success.
Unreal Engine 5 is empowering creators to build the next generation of real-time 3D experiences. The future of entertainment is being built on UE5.
The new season is here. Drop in and discover a new map, new weapons, and a new battle pass.
The new GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER is here. Up to 2x faster with DLSS 3. The ultimate way to experience your favorite games.
Our new RDNA 3 graphics cards deliver incredible performance and value for gamers. FidelityFX Super Resolution 3 is here to boost your frame rates.
